attributes.action: Ban the use of METHYL METHACRYLATE (MMA) in the nail industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: METHYL METHACRYLATE is a dangerous chemical often found in the liquid monomer used for Nail Extensions. It can cause severe allergic reactions as well as respiratory problems. It has been banned in 30 states in the US so why is this chemical still legal here to be used on the unsuspecting public? The nail industry needs regulating as does the chemicals that are used within it. This chemical is dangerous.
